t: Bump Patrol Crosses 10,000 Five-Star Reviews, Ranks Among Amazon’s Top Aftershave Solutions
s: 1 week ago - Bump Patrol, a leader in ingrown hair and razor bump treatment, has officially surpassed 10,000 five-star reviews on Amazon. This marks a significant milestone for the brand, with nearly 75 percent of its more than 13,000 total reviews rated five stars.
